name: Matty Hat for Girls
description:
We created this cute little hat to look like a flour sack, so say it looks like a kitty hat. It's knit as a simple squared hat with a thick ribbed brim in a contrasting color. Then we tied off the corners to create the little pointed 'ears'.

We made the hat pictured in the main listing photo with Pink and White yarn.

Our Matty Hat is a perfect newborn photography prop, or we can make it in larger sizes for older babies and children.

There is one hat available, ready to ship.

Size: 
Newborn 

ùÑ™ Made of 100% wool yarn

ùÑ™ Care: Hand wash. Lay flat to dry.

Please Note:

Every attempt has been made to accurately represent colors. All monitors will display colors differently. My Knoodle Knits is not responsible for discrepancies in color.

Sizes for hats are estimates, as each baby's head is unique. Please measure accurately, as there are no returns due to sizing errors on the customer's behalf. If you have questions about sizing please contact us before purchasing this item.

Check out our shop policies prior to making your purchase: http://www.etsy.com/shop/knoodleknits/policy

name: Carter Hat
description:
We created this hand knit hat when my son needed a winter hat. He's a notorious picky-hat-resister and needed to have a comfortable hat with plenty of stretch. It's been created with a ribbed brim and solid knit top. A contrasting stripe of seed stitch encircles the middle. 

We made the hat pictured in the main listing photo with Black and Red wool yarn. 

This hat will fit most boys 3T+.

ùÑ™ Made of 100% wool yarn

name: Toddler Wool Pants
description:
This listing is for a pair of longies knit by Knoodle Knits from their own pattern. 

These wool pants can be used for cloth diapering or as a photo prop in a birthday shoot. We can also make a matching hat if you desire.

The longies feature strong gusseting in the crotch and several short rows for accommodating the bulk of cloth diapers. Alternating knit and purl stripes of green, blue and brown accent the legs. These longies have been knit using 100% wool yarn.

They have the following measurements at rest:

Waist: 20 in (stretching to 24 in)
Hips: 21 in (stretching to 30 in) 
Rise: 18 in
Inseam: 11 in

Please send us a convo if you are interested in a different size for this design. We offer discounts for toddler and newborn matching sets.

Made of 100% wool yarn.

Please measure accurately, as there are no returns due to sizing errors on the customer's behalf. They will be washed and lanolinized using Ewe Need It wool wash.

Every attempt has been made to accurately represent colors. All monitors will display colors differently. Knoodle Knits is not responsible for discrepancies in color.

name: Sari Ribbon Hat
description:
The Sari Ribbon Hat is an original My Knoodle Knits design. 

We created this hat after receiving a large shipment of Sari ribbon from India. We wanted to make something that would showcase the vibrant colors and unique texture of this yarn.

Sari silk yarn is produced by recycling the selvedges of silk fabric during the sari making process. Rather than discarding it, the selvedge ends are stitched end-to-end to produce this colorful silk yarn. By it's very nature, no two skeins are alike, therefore no two hats that we make will be the same.

We obtain our Sari silk yarn from a supplier that works with women's development groups in Nepal. The women make this yarn in their homes in order to produce additional income to support and improve their family earnings. 

We made the hat pictured in the main listing photo with a light grey wool yarn and strips of bright Sari silk ribbon. While we can try to match the listing photo, please understand that the unique nature of this product means that each hat is unique, and no two alike. If you have a specific set of colors in mind, please convo us and we can try to accomodate your request. 

Our Sari Ribbon Hat is a perfect newborn photography prop. You will receive the exact hat that is featured in the third photo.

Like what you see? Check out our shop for more gorgeous hand knit and crocheted items:
http://www.etsy.com/shop/knoodleknits

name: Sloane's Shrug
description:
This listing is for the Sloane's Shrug by Knoodle Knits.

This little sweater has been designed with the active baby, toddler, and child in mind. Detailed with lace eyelets and picot edging at the waist, collar, and sleeves, it's the perfect coverup for early Autumn nights. 

Knit in a creamy pumpkin colored wool, a maple leaf button has been designed to match, by Tessa Ann Designs.

This sweater will fit most children sized 24 months. Please refer to our measurements below for an accurate fit.

Chest: 20 in
Length: 9 in
Sleeve: 1.25 in (under arm)

Made of 100% wool

name: Valentine's Day Wool Pants
description:
This listing is for a pair of longies knit by Knoodle Knits from their own pattern. 

These wool pants can be used for cloth diapering or as a photo prop in a birthday shoot or Valentine's shoot. We can also make a matching hat if you desire.

The longies feature strong gusseting in the crotch and several short rows for accommodating the bulk of cloth diapers.We used a thick wool yarn that has been discontinued, dark grey trim with a deep red base containing flecks of black and white. These longies have been knit using 100% wool yarn.

They have the following measurements at rest:

Waist: 16 in 
Hips: 20 in 
Rise: 16 in
Inseam: 9 in

Made of 100% wool yarn.

Please measure accurately, as there are no returns due to sizing errors on the customer's behalf. They will be washed and lanolinized using Ewe Need It wool wash.

name: Christmas Beret
description:
The Christmas Beret is an original design by Knoodle Knits. 

We created this dainty beret with Christmas colors. Then we accented it with an open eyelet band and a gold bow. The model photos show how this hat can be used as a prop on a newborn.

The hat pictured here is made with deep crimson and dark green wool yarn and a gold colored ribbon. 

The Christmas Beret is a perfect newborn photography prop.

description:

The hat pictured here is made of dark grey and cranberry acrylic yarn. 

Our Tartan Christmas Beanie is a perfect newborn photography prop.

name: Valentine Matty Hat
description:
The Matty Hat is an original My Knoodle Knits design. 

We created this hand knit hat with a ribbed brim and solid knit top. It is bound off with a square edge then each corner is tied with a bow to give it a sack appearance.

We made the hat pictured in the main listing photo with Charcoal and Black wool yarn, and added a red felt heart. 

Our Matty Hat is a perfect newborn photography prop.
